summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the City Light Department, authorizing the execution of a lease agreement for a portion of the City Light Department's former Capitol Substation site to Warren J. Guykema and Judith J. Gykema, husband and wife, for a period of five years commencing on the 1st day of the month following the passage of this Ordinance. (P.M. \#250428-3-401).
